thread.title: Apple Piles On as Senate Debates Cyber Bill
thread.title_full: Apple Piles On as Senate Debates Cyber Bill - WSJ

author: Damian Paletta
title: Apple Piles On as Senate Debates Cyber Bill
text:
Apple Inc. said it can’t support a cybersecurity bill pending in the U.S. Senate, challenging a bipartisan bloc of lawmakers who were hoping to muscle the bill through without major resistance.
Apple late Tuesday joined Twitter Inc., which voiced its opposition to the Cybersecurity Information Sharing Act of 2015 earlier in the day.
